articles.author: Mitchell Clark
articles.title: Apple releases macOS update to prevent damage from third-party docks and dongles - The Verge
articles.description: According to Apple’s release notes, the macOS 11.2.2 update fixes an issue where late model MacBook Pros and Airs were being damaged after being plugged into “third-party, non-compliant powered USB-C hubs and docks.”
articles.content:
11.2.2 looks to prevent an issue that was killing newer MacBook Airs and Pros
Photo by Vjeran Pavic / The Verge
Apple is once again releasing an update to prevent a charging problem from killing Ma… [+1741 chars]
